Text:
As I said at the time, our area veterans deserve accessible, high-quality medical care in return for their service to our country & shutting down Castle Point would have been a slap in the face.
(6/6)

As I called for in March, the closure of the Castle Point VA or the reduction of even a single service to local veterans was not an option. Our community efforts were successful & I am honored to know our veterans will continue to be cared for right here in the community.
(5/6)

We came together as a community, fought for our veterans, & we won. I am pleased that we succeeded in keeping the Castle Point VA Medical Center open, despite efforts from the Biden Administration & lack of efforts from our current representatives in Congress.
(4/6)

We also ran a petition campaign to fight Castle Point's closure:
https://t.co/iMpLxtaC0y
(3/6)

In March, I held a joint press conference with Dutchess County Exec @marcmolinaro, & other local elected officials & veterans calling for the immediate reversal of the decision to close Castle Point.

Press Conference: https://t.co/6t0JEBIZgD

(2/6) https://t.co/zBqyMbn44C

üö® BREAKING: CASTLE POINT VA TO REMAIN OPEN

Our efforts were successful and Castle Point VA Medical Center will remain open for all local veterans.

(Thread) https://t.co/HUJjB7tSeO

Schmitt cont.."Now more than ever we need leaders at all levels of government who have a proven track record of backing the blue & working to keep our communities safe. I am that leader & as the Hudson Valley‚Äôs next congressman will always put our Hudson Valley families first.‚Äù

"Our NYS Troopers are renowned across the country and world as law enforcement leaders. To have their support and endorsement in my campaign to win our  NY-18 congressional district is humbling and greatly appreciated..."

Mungeer Cont.."With the continued disaster of bail reform plaguing our streets, violent crime spiking, & calls to ‚Äòdefund the police,‚Äô we need more principled leaders like Colin Schmitt in Congress. We are honored & proud to stand with Colin Schmitt who has always stood for us.‚Äù
